title: [Health] The COVID-19 basic reproduction ratio (R0) in large urban jails is of a higher magnitude than R0 for other congregate settings, like the Diamond Princess. If more people are not released from jails, COVID-19 outbreaks in correctional facilities will continue (and drive community-level outbreaks).
[Medicine] Rogue Antibodies and Gene Mutations Explain Some Cases of Severe COVID-19
